name: New Beginnings (Utas Jam Game)
description:
Game developed in 3 days or UTASPlay July 2022. Theme was new Beginnings

W and S move forward and back

A and D rotate

Q and E strafe

Space to use Sensors

All movement uses fuel

Guide a colony ship to a new home using tips found in the game.

Font - Android Nation - Blambot Fonts

Background Image - Deposit Stock Photos
